[ { \"uniqueID\" : \"aethers.notebook.appender.managed.file.FileAppender\", \"name\" : \"File Appender\", \"description\" : \"Appends log messages to the filesystem.\", \"serviceClass\" : \"aethers.notebook.appender.managed.file.FileAppender\", \"configurable\" : true, \"enabled\" : true, \"builtin\" : true, \"deleted\" : false, \"version\" : 1 }, { \"uniqueID\" : \"aethers.notebook.appender.managed.uploader.UploaderAppender\", \"name\" : \"Uploader Appender\", \"description\" : \"Pushes log messages to a remote server.\", \"serviceClass\" : \"aethers.notebook.appender.managed.uploader.UploaderAppender\", \"configurable\" : true, \"enabled\" : true, \"builtin\" : true, \"deleted\" : false, \"version\" : 1 } ]

Does Virtual Travel replace Physical Travel? Mapping People Social and Spatial Networks. 

'Substitution hypothesis' claims that virtual travel (communications/shared experiences) over ICT can replace physical travel. However, 'complementary hypothesis' suggests that virtual travel actually increase demand of physical travel, by allowing people to develop and maintain relations and friendships regardless of distance. 

This application integrate with SMS and call log to collect data on the network of contacts the user was communicating with (but not the content of sms and calls). Some additional information such as GPS location, wifi, etc is also collected. But user can turn the loggers off any time. 

A series of visualisation of the user's social and spatial network will be presented to users as an incentive for your participation. 

Your information is safe with us. 

Contact ... if you have any questions about the research. 
Thank you for your participation.

Contact ... if you have any questions about the research. 

---------------- 

Does Virtual Travel replace Physical Travel? Mapping People Social and Spatial Networks 

'Substitution hypothesis' claims that virtual travel (communications/shared experiences) over ICT can replace physical travel. However, 'complementary hypothesis' suggests that virtual travel actually increase demand of physical travel, by allowing people to develop and maintain relations and friendships regardless of distance. 

This application integrate with SMS and call log to collect data on the network of contacts the user was communicating with (but not the content of sms and calls). Some additional information such as GPS location, wifi, etc is also collected. But user can turn the loggers off any time. 

A series of visualisation of the user's social and spatial network will be presented to users as an incentive for your participation. 

Your information is safe with us.
